mapper.select: /* RPRT1020.SELECT_GNDR : Search Customer Gender(고객 성별 조회) */ SELECT ITEM_SMLCLAS_CD AS CODE /* Small category code(소분류코드) */ , ITEM_SMLCLAS_NM AS TEXT /* Small category name(소분류코드명) */ FROM T_ITEM_SMLCLAS_CD WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ITEM_LRGCLAS_CD = 'CUST_GNDR'

/* RPRT1020.SELECT_GRD : Search Customer Grade(고객 등급 조회) */ SELECT ITEM_SMLCLAS_CD AS CODE /* Small category code(소분류코드) */ , ITEM_SMLCLAS_NM AS TEXT /* Small category name(소분류코드명) */ FROM T_ITEM_SMLCLAS_CD WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ITEM_LRGCLAS_CD = 'CUST_GRD'
